_header: Mistress Anne this book and my heart is all yours
Subjects: bookplates; lovers, addresses to beloved; women
_description: Verses for offering a book as a gift — two couplets

HunHM1087.Transcription:
Mystres Anne this Boke & my hartte ys all yoursGode send yow good
                    Chaunce & meny good New yersseAnd al hallone that be with yn this Boke
                    exprestesend me your owne my desyre & harttes Reste
HunHM1087.Note:
Written in a hand of the sixteenth century; addressed to Anne, with
                    signature, ‘En dieu Essperaunce A. W.’ (f.
                    145v).
HunHM1087.Editions:
Schulz,  Herbert. C., Norma B. Cuthbert,   and  Naydée Noya.  
             Ten Centuries of Manuscripts in the Huntington Library.
         San Marino, CA: Huntington Library, 1962: 6.
Dutschke,  C. W. 
             Guide to Medieval and Renaissance Manuscripts in the Huntington
                Library.
         2 vols. San Marino, CA: Huntington Library, 1989: 2.396.
